text.0: the three times seven milchkine in the eastern heaven have for this soma poured the genuine milky draught.
text.1: four other beauteous creatures hath he made for his adornment when he waxed in strength through holy rites.
text.2: longing for lovely amṛta by his wisdom he divided each apart from other earth and heaven.
text.3: he gladly wrapped himself in the most lucid floods when through their glory they found the gods restingplace.
text.4: may those his brilliant rays he ever free from death inviolate for both classes of created things.
text.5: rays wherewith powers of men and gods are purified yea even for this have sageswelcomed him as king.
text.6: he while he is adorned by the ten skilful ones that he too in the midmost mothers may create.
text.7: while he is watching oer the lovely amṛtas ways looks on both races as beholder of mankind.
text.8: he while he is adorned to stream forth mighty strength rejoices in his place between the earth and heaven.
text.9: the steer dispels the evilhearted with his might aiming at offerings as an archer at the game.
text.10: beholding as it were two mother cows the steer goes roaring on his way even as the maruts roar.
text.11: knowing eternal law the earliest light of heaven he passing wise was chosen out to tell it forth.
text.12: the fearful bull is bellowing with violent might farsighted sharpening his yellowcoloured horns.
text.13: soma assumes his seat in the wellfashioned place the cowhide and the sheepskin are his ornament.
text.14: bright making pure his body free from spot and stain on the sheeps back the goldencoloured hath flowed down.
text.15: acceptable to mitra vāyu varuṇa he is prepared as threefold meal by skilful men.
text.16: flow on for the gods banquet soma as a steer and enter indras heart the somas reservoir.
text.17: bear us beyond misfortune ere we be oppres sed the man who knows the land directs the man who asks.
text.18: urged like a carsteed flow to strength o soma indu flow onward to the throat of indra.
text.19: skilled bear us past as in a boat oer water as battling hero save us from the foeman.
